RESEARCH PROJECTS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580567210894{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

In the context of its research activities, UNIPA pays particular attention to the implementation of research projects, either individually or through collaborations with universities, research centers and institutions at both national and international levels.

The involvement of UNIPA in research projects aims to promote excellence, create the right research environment, foster innovation, transfer know-how practices, and upgrade teaching and education at large. The successful implementation of all the research projects implemented by the University is based on the outstanding activity of its scientific staff supported by modern infrastructure and cutting-edge scientific equipment. The financial management of all research projects in which UNIPA participates is carried out by the Special Account for Research Grants. Research projects are performed or provided by faculty members, students and other staff of the University, and/or in collaboration with other dedicated scientists both from the academia and labor market.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
